text: I'm the data and graphics editor at The Trace, where I develop interactives, newsroom tools, and more. Before that, I was the web editor of The Phnom Penh Post. My work has also been published in The New Yorker, FiveThirtyEight, USA TODAY, Slate, and The Daily Beast. I live in Toronto.
Get in touch! @dnlnss or dnlnss@gmail.com.
